wikipedia_page.main: Rachel Katherine Schofield (born 13 March 1976 in Winchester, Hampshire) is an English journalist and news presenter.

response: * Rachel Schofield – journalist and BBC News presenter

Vine was married to an American banker, Janelle, for seven years, which ended in 2000. Vine stated that it was very sad, but their jobs and travel meant they had seen very little of each other in three years. He married Rachel Schofield, a journalist and news presenter, in 2002. The couple have two daughters.
* Rachel Schofield (born 1976), British journalist and news presenter for BBC News
*Rachel Schofield, journalist, was born in Winchester
